Dialogue.Page: Unnamed Mystery is a story mod originally designed to be a submission to the first mod jam, but was released as a standalone because it didn't fit the theme.
The mod is about a group of Nomai getting stranded in a star system located just outside the bounds of the universe.
Unnamed Mystery was able to deliver a great story mod without the use of code, but its story is still not complete.
The developer has also recently announced their plans to completely remaster the mod.
